vaccineData.name: Influenza (Flu) Vaccine
vaccineData.description: Annual vaccine to protect against seasonal influenza viruses.
vaccineData.eligibility: All adults, especially those with chronic diseases or older adults.
vaccineData.precautions: Delay if you have high fever or allergy to previous flu vaccine.
vaccineData.administration: Intramuscular injection in the upper arm by a nurse.

vaccineData.name: Tdap (Tetanus, Diphtheria, Pertussis)
vaccineData.description: Protects against tetanus, diphtheria, and whooping cough.
vaccineData.eligibility: All adults, especially pregnant women and healthcare workers.
vaccineData.precautions: Avoid if allergic to any previous dose of Tdap.
vaccineData.administration: Injection in the upper arm by a nurse.

vaccineData.name: Shingles (Herpes Zoster)
vaccineData.description: Prevents shingles in older adults, recommended for adults 50+.
vaccineData.precautions: Avoid during pregnancy or severe immune deficiency.
vaccineData.administration: Injection in the upper arm by a nurse.

vaccineData.name: Pneumococcal Vaccine
vaccineData.description: Protects against pneumococcal diseases like pneumonia.
vaccineData.eligibility: All adults above 65 years, and younger adults with chronic illness.
vaccineData.precautions: Postpone if sick with moderate to severe illness.
vaccineData.administration: Injection in the upper arm by a nurse.

vaccineData.name: HPV Vaccine
vaccineData.description: Protects against human papillomavirus and related cancers.
vaccineData.eligibility: All adolescents and adults up to 26 years old.
vaccineData.administration: Injection in the upper arm by a nurse.

vaccineData.name: COVID-19 Vaccine (Booster)
vaccineData.eligibility: All adults, especially those with chronic diseases or frontline workers.
vaccineData.precautions: Postpone if actively infected with COVID.
vaccineData.administration: Injection in the upper arm by a nurse.

vaccineData.name: Hepatitis B Vaccine
vaccineData.description: Protects against hepatitis B infection and liver disease.
vaccineData.eligibility: Unvaccinated adults, healthcare workers, and high-risk individuals.
vaccineData.precautions: Avoid if allergic to yeast or previous dose.
vaccineData.administration: Injection in the upper arm by a nurse.
